title: My Pixel 2 phone w/ Pixel Launcher shows the weather of the wrong location, how can I fix this?
content:
My Pixel 2 XL with Pixel Launcher has been showing the wrong weather on the at a glance widget and the lock screen. I don't know where this weather is coming from since when I click on it I then see the correct weather and location. Use location is on. I tried switching to a different launcher, which because it's a different widget it will show the correct weather on the home screen but the lock screen still shows the wrong weather. 
I recently turned off tracking and personalization type Google stuff because I didn't want to be tracked and search results were horrendous and unusable.
The weather issue was there before I made these adjustments.
